scripts.TODO(wittjosiah): Resolve the asset path issue here.
scripts.generate:api: typedoc --tsconfig ../tsconfig.json --plugin typedoc-plugin-markdown --out docs/api --gitRevision main --githubPages false --hideBreadcrumbs true --hideInPageTOC true --allReflectionsHaveOwnDocument true --hideMembersSymbol true --entryPointStrategy packages --entryPoints ../packages/core/**/* --entryPoints ../packages/sdk/*
scripts.prerelease: pnpm run generate:api && pnpm run cleanup:api && pnpm run docs:build
